text: “brrda phu sraththa thanghlay! Hak phwk cea ya ke rng xallxhˌ phraxngkh k ca thrng hı mi kæ phwk cea sung sing thi canæk rahwang khwam cring læa khwam thec læa ca thrng lblang brrda khwam phid khxng phwk cea xxk cak phwk cea læa ca thrng xphaythosʹ hı kæ phwk cea dwy læa xallxhˌ nan khux phuthrng mi buy khun xan hıy hlwng”
